item.title: Granny Flat Investment Australia 2026: The State-by-State Guide to Boosting Your Rental Yield
item.description:
If you’ve been sitting on a decent-sized block wondering how to squeeze more income out of it, you’re not alone. Granny flat investment in Australia has absolutely exploded over the past few years â€” and in 2026, the numbers are making more sense than ever.

With national home values up 8.8% over 2025 according to PropTrack, rental vacancy rates still tight in most capitals, and building costs starting to stabilise after the post-COVID blowout, adding a secondary dwelling to your existing property is one of the smartest value-add plays going around.
